scripts.export:wp-content: npm run cli rm -- -rf .export/wp-content && mkdir -p .export/wp-content/uploads && run-p export:wp-content:*
scripts.export:db: mkdir -p .export/sql && npm run wp db -- export .export/sql/local.sql
scripts.pretest:unit:php: wp-env start && npm run composer install-theme
scripts.test:lint:php: wp-env start && npm run composer lint
scripts.test:unit:php: wp-env start && wp-env run --env-cwd="wp-content/plugins/snow-monkey-archive-content" tests-wordpress -- vendor/bin/phpunit -c .phpunit.xml.dist --verbose
scripts.zip:pack: rsync -a --exclude='/vendor' --exclude='/node_modules' --exclude='.*' --exclude='*.config.js' --exclude='*.xml.dist' --exclude='*.ruleset.xml' --exclude='/bin' --exclude='/tests' --exclude='package*.json' . snow-monkey-archive-content && wp-env start && npm run composer install -- --no-dev -d snow-monkey-archive-content
scripts.zip: npm run clean:zip && npm run zip:pack && npm run zip:archive
scripts.make-pot: wp-env start && npm run wp i18n -- make-pot . ./languages/snow-monkey-archive-content.pot -- --exclude=.*,src
